RawDataWindow - Class in javanews.gui.internalframe
This class can be attached to a displayed instance of COMPortClient and is used to display messages received by the application.
RawDataWindow(String) - Constructor for class javanews.gui.internalframe.RawDataWindow
Initialises a new window to display raw data that has been received by the application prior to processing by the PortReader class.
rdwData - Variable in class javanews.gui.internalframe.COMPortClient
The windwo displaying information received directly from the COM port, if open
RECOGNISED_LINK_TABLE - Variable in class javanews.events.table.RowListener
The constant used to indicate that the class is attached to an instance of the recognised link table
RECOGNISED_LINK_TABLE - Variable in class javanews.gui.internalframe.COMPortClient
The constant used to indicate that the class is attached to an instance of the recognised link table
removeAllNewLinks() - Method in class javanews.database.SQLStatements
Returns the SQL string used to remove all discovered links from the database during the application shutdown.
removeChartWindow(String) - Method in class javanews.gui.internalframe.COMPortClient
Remove and close the chart window from the current window.
removeDiscoveredLink(String) - Method in class javanews.database.DbInterface
Removes a named entry from tblNewLinks (discovered links table)
removeDiscoveredLink(String) - Method in class javanews.gui.internalframe.COMPortClient
Removes the specified link from the new links table within the database and from the GUI.
removeNewLink() - Method in class javanews.database.SQLStatements
Returns the SQL string used to remove a designated link from the new links table.
removeRawDataWindow() - Method in class javanews.gui.internalframe.COMPortClient
Removes an instance of RawDataWindow from the class.
removeRow(int) - Method in class javanews.object.table.GenericTable
Used to remove a particular row from the table model.
ReportTree - Class in javanews.events.table
This class is used to determine the node selected within the report tree object and initiate the event that should be associated with it.

Creates a new instance of ReportTree and associates it with the parent GUI window
reportTree - Variable in class javanews.gui.internalframe.COMPortClient

returnedNewLinkID - Variable in class javanews.database.DbInterface
The ID of a discovered link requested as part of a search
RowListener - Class in javanews.events.table
This class is to be attached to instances of JTable shown within the main GUI windows.
RowListener(int, JTable, COMPortClient) - Constructor for class javanews.events.table.RowListener
This initialises the class and attaches the owners to it by including references to the owning instances in the list of arguments.
run() - Method in class javanews.object.PortReader
Starts the thread running using either a normal COM port (COM1 - COM98) or to use the test port which reads data from a local file (COM99).
RunJavaNews - Class in javanews.run
Used to create the application environment and launch the main GUI.
RunJavaNews() - Constructor for class javanews.run.RunJavaNews
 
runTestPort() - Method in class javanews.object.PortReader
Runs a simulated port which can be used for testing where a COM port or PSE might not be available.
